Title: Soldiers of Wounded Knee
Summary: Group shot of the Seventh (7th) Cavalry? posed with rifles in their camp on the Pine Ridge Reservation, South Dakota. The soldiers wear uniforms, some with fur skin caps and ammunition belts.
Description: 1 copy photonegative ; 13 x 18 cm. (5 x 7 in.); 1 photoprint ; 13 x 18 cm. (5 x 7 in.)
Type of Material: Film negatives.; Photographic prints.; Imaged.; Image
Subject: Dakota Indians--Government relations--South Dakota--Pine Ridge--1890-1900.; Indians of North America--Government relations--South Dakota--Pine Ridge--1890-1900.; Wounded Knee Massacre, S.D., 1890.; Pine Ridge Indian Reservation (S.D.)--1890-1900.; Cavalry--South Dakota--Pine Ridge--1890-1900.; Soldiers--South Dakota--Pine Ridge--1890-1900.; United States. Army. Cavalry, 7th.--1890-1900.
